page.title: 03POCKET MONEY
page.content:
Currency 1985 :- 1p, 2p, 5p, 10p, 20p, 50p are all coins. Â£1.00, Â£5.00, Â£10.00, Â£20.00, Â£50.00 Â£100.00 are notes.
I recieve Â£2.50 a week, the average is Â£5.00 a month. Pocket money is common in the year 1985. Almost evryone gets over 50p a week. We spend our pocket money on things like presents for birthdays or may be some sweets. Some children in my class buy comics but. I buy word searches. I save more pocket money than I spend, because as I get so much, saving becomes a good idea.
